#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t, n, k, i, p[] = {947, 953, 967, 971, 977, 983, 991, 997}, pi, max, m;
    long long int x;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int c[1000] = {0};
        long long int a[1000] = {0};
        max = 0;
        cin>>n>>k;
        for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
        {
            pi = 7;
            cin>>x;
            while(pi--)
            {
                m = (x % p[pi]);
                if(a[m] == 0)
                {
                    a[m] = x;
                    c[m] = 1;
                    break;
                }
                else if(a[m] == x)
                {
                    c[m]++;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(max < c[m])
                max = c[m];
        }
        cout<<(k - max)<<endl;
    }
}
